item.description:
Celebrate the end of the year by giving your body and mind a true nourishment!

Experience simple Qi-Gong exercises that make you more flexible, balanced, energized and clear-headed. Feel stronger and also calmer.

Qi-Gong is a way of connecting to your body and getting in touch with its deeper needs. The needs we often dismiss because of our other "more important" commitments. We forget that our body likes to move and feel alive.

This class is an opportunity to do something for yourself at the end of the busy year and get

some extra energy for the holiday season:)

The exercises are simple, but helps your brain to focus, muscles to relax and mind to get clarity. Your whole being feels refreshed and relaxed at the end of the class.

70 mins class: warm-up, Qi-Gong exercises,  self-massage and meditation.

Recommended level: Beginners (Never done any exercises)

10am on Thursday, December 20th at the Acupuncture and Wellness Clinic.

http://www.awclinic.com/home.html

Space is limited to 3people.

Small group classes provide an individual attention and help you to get more benefits out of the practice.


Price: FREE!!

Usual price:

$20 - drop-in ($15 if paid for 6 or more classes)
item.how_to_find_us: On the first floor in the brick building. Parking lot is behind the building.
item.name: Holiday special: Free Qi Gong class!
